1.0.name: wordpress/bistri-video-conference
1.0.description:
Bistri is free video calling and video conferencing solution. Fully Open, no need to register to call a Bister. Bistri runs in your browser, no need to install additional software or plugin.

The Bistri Conference Plugin allows you to add a "join the conference" button on your blog.

A few options give you the possibility to customize the button appearance (label, room name, ...)
